title: Secrets & Seduction
description: Best Erotica of 2015! Winner - National Indie Excellence Award !One woman. One man. One catfish. One Dominatrix. One Parrot. Lots of Whips. Cigs. Chains. Strap-Ons. And No Safe Words.Secrets & Seduction Janet met a nice guy online. Nothing prepared her for what happened next... Written by a former "adult entertainment" star of the 1990's, Secrets & Seduction is the next upgrade from virtual into reality with an air of authenticity. Part thriller, part erotic romance, Secrets & Seduction is a fast-paced read that has you gripping at your seat wondering, "Could this possibly happen?"Secrets & Seduction
author: Cheri Blossum
